name: Unbound
requirement: Escape from Helgen during the dragon attack

name: Bleak Falls Barrow
requirement: Retrieve the Dragonstone from Bleak Falls Barrow

name: The Way of the Voice
requirement: Learn the Way of the Voice from the Greybeards

name: Dragonslayer
requirement: Defeat Alduin and save Skyrim

name: Thu'um Master
requirement: Discover and unlock 20 different shouts

name: Dragonborn
requirement: Absorb a dragon soul for the first time
reward: Unlock the power of the Thu'um

name: Glory of the Dead
requirement: Complete the Companions questline

name: Revealing the Unseen
requirement: Find the Staff of Magnus

name: The Eye of Magnus
requirement: Complete the College of Winterhold questline

name: Taking Care of Business
requirement: Complete your first job for the Thieves Guild

name: Darkness Returns
requirement: Return the Skeleton Key to the Twilight Sepulcher
reward: Become Guild Master and gain Nightingale powers

name: With Friends Like These...
requirement: Complete your first contract for the Dark Brotherhood

name: Hail Sithis!
requirement: Complete the Dark Brotherhood questline
reward: Become leader of the Dark Brotherhood

name: Golden Touch
requirement: Accumulate 100,000 gold pieces

name: Master Criminal
description: Bounty of 1000 gold in all nine holds
requirement: Have a bounty of at least 1000 gold in each hold

name: Reader
requirement: Read 50 different skill books to gain skill increases

name: Explorer
requirement: Discover and map 100 different locations

name: Master
requirement: Achieve character level 50

name: Skill Master
requirement: Raise any skill to 100

name: Legend
requirement: Defeat your first Legendary Dragon
reward: Prove yourself against the mightiest dragons

name: Blessed
requirement: Activate any Standing Stone

name: Oblivion Walker
requirement: Obtain 15 Daedric Artifacts from Daedric Princes

name: One with the Shadows
description: Returned the Thieves Guild to its former glory
requirement: Complete all Thieves Guild radiant quests in all holds
reward: Restore the Thieves Guild to greatness

name: Sideways
requirement: Complete 10 miscellaneous side quests

name: War Hero
description: Capture Fort Sungard or Fort Greenwall
requirement: Complete a Civil War fort siege mission
